practice_phrases: I won't be able to
我不能
I won't be able to go
我不能去
I won't be able to meet you
我不能见面你
I won't be able to finish soon
我不能很快完成
I won't be able to tell you what happened
我不能告诉你发生了什么
I won't be able to go to a restaurant tonight
我不能今晚去餐厅
I hope you don't mind if I won't be able to wait
我希望如果我不能等你不介意
I won't be able to meet on Saturday night if you can't finish
如果你不能完成，我不能在星期六晚上见面
I won't be able to tell you in exactly the same way what I was hoping
我不能用完全相同的方式告诉你我希望什么
Can you tell me if I won't be able to go to a restaurant tomorrow morning
你能告诉我我明天早上能不能去餐厅吗
Be there
在那里
I won't be able to be there
我不能在那里
She was very kind when she was there
当她在那里时，她非常友好
Can you tell me if you'll be there
你能告诉我你会不会在那里吗
I hope you can be there tomorrow morning
我希望你明天早上能在那里
I don't mind if you won't be able to be there
如果你不能在那里，我不介意
Do you want to be there on Saturday night at the restaurant
你想星期六晚上在餐厅那里吗
I won't be able to be there if you can't tell me where to meet
如果你不能告诉我在哪里见面，我不能在那里
She said she would be there but I wasn't hoping that would happen
她说她会在那里，但我不希望那会发生
I hope you don't mind waiting a few minutes if I won't be able to be there soon
我希望如果我不能很快在那里你不介意等几分钟

那里

去那里
I want to go there
我想去那里

她在那里非常友好

他在那里不是很耐心

我不介意明天早上在那里等

你想去那里的餐厅吗

当她在那里看到我时，她非常友好
Can you tell me if you want to meet there tomorrow
你能告诉我你明天是否想在那里见面吗
That wasn't what I was hoping would happen there on Saturday night
那不是我希望会在星期六晚上在那里发生的事
